metadata.name: The Gun [Story Page] #1/20
metadata.description:
Just for a while she arrived and saw that she was surrounded by a group of strange creatures. They were tall and slender, with skin the color of green. "Welcome, traveler," one of the creatures said, its voice like the soft rustle of leaves. "We have been waiting for you." Seraphim felt a chill run down her spine.

"We have given you a special gun," the creature said, holding out a shimmering silver weapon. "With it, you can defeat the evil that threatens our world."

Seraphim took the gun, feeling its weight in her hand. It was sleek and futuristic, with a pulsing energy core at its center.
